workspace.title: user account of interest can have many workspaces

Account.description: @brief Represents an account in the context of the service.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the file was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the file was last updated.

size.description: Size of the file in bytes.

isDeleted.description: Flag indicating if the file is marked as deleted.

version.description: Version of the file metadata format.

s3Key.description:
s3 key path
S3 key (path within the S3 bucket) for the file.

s3BucketName.description: Name of the S3 bucket where the file is stored.

s3Region.description: AWS region where the S3 bucket is located.

s3VersionId.description: Version ID of the file, used when versioning is enabled in the S3 bucket.

s3Etag.description: Entity tag (ETag) of the file, a hash of the file used for change detection.

s3ContentLength.description: Size of the file in bytes.

s3ContentEncoding.description: Encoding format used on the file, if any (e.g., gzip).

s3ContentDisposition.description: How the file is to be presented in a web browser (attachment, inline).

s3LastModified.description: The date and time when the file was last modified in S3.

s3StorageClass.description: S3 storage class of the file (e.g., STANDARD, INTELLIGENT_TIERING, GLACIER).

s3ServerSideEncryption.description: Details of server-side encryption used on the file, if any (e.g., AES256, aws:kms).

s3Acl.description: Access control list (ACL) permissions for the file in S3.

s3Metadata.description: Custom metadata added to the file in S3 as key-value pairs.

childFolder.title: folders can have many children folders

files.title: files present in the folder of the workspace

s3BucketName.description: The S3 bucket name where the folder is located.

s3FolderPath.description: The prefix path representing the folder in the S3 bucket.

s3Region.description: AWS region where the S3 bucket containing the folder is located.

s3Metadata.description: Custom metadata for the folder, represented as key-value pairs.

s3Acl.description: Access control list (ACL) permissions for the folder in S3.

s3LastModified.description:
The date and time when the folder was last modified in S3.
This might represent the last time a file was added, removed, or changed in the folder.

s3BucketName.description: The S3 bucket name where the folder is located.

s3FolderPath.description: The prefix path representing the folder in the S3 bucket.

s3Region.description: AWS region where the S3 bucket containing the folder is located.

s3Metadata.description: Custom metadata for the folder, represented as key-value pairs.

s3Acl.description: Access control list (ACL) permissions for the folder in S3.

s3LastModified.description:
The date and time when the folder was last modified in S3.
This might represent the last time a file was added, removed, or changed in the folder.

uniqueIdentifier.title: unique identifier for the workspace of interest
